member.name: IIsoImageManager.get_Path
member.summary: Retrieves the logical path to an .iso image.
member.param: Pointer to the logical path to an .iso image. For example, "c:\path\file.iso".

member.name: IIsoImageManager.get_Stream
member.summary: Retrieves the IStream object associated with the .iso image.
member.param: The IStream object associated with the .iso image.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IIsoImageManager.SetPath
member.summary: Sets the Path property value with a logical path to an .iso image.
member.param: The logical path to the .iso image. For example, "c:\path\file.iso".

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

listheader.description:
Path '%1!s!' is badly formed or contains invalid characters.
Value: 0xC0AAB110

member.name: IIsoImageManager.SetStream
member.summary: Sets the Stream property with the IStream object associated with the .iso image.
member.param: The IStream object associated with the .iso image.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IIsoImageManager
member.summary: Use this interface to verify if an existing .iso file contains a valid file system for burning.
